mapper.insert: insert into g_goods_param (GOODS_ID, BRAND_ID, FOOD_TASTE, WEIGHT, LENGTH, SIZE, COLOR, PACKAGES, STORAGE_TYPE, SOURCE_ADDR, PRODUCE_ADDR, INGREDIENTS, SPECS, PRO_STANDARD, PRO_LICENSE_NO, EAT_METHOD, CLICK_COUNT, IS_ALONESALE, INTEGRAL, IS_DELETE, IS_BEST, IS_NEW, IS_HOT, IS_PROMOTE, BONUS_TYPE_ID, SELLER_NOTE, GIVE_INTEGRAL) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{foodTaste,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{length,jdbcType=REAL}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{produceAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ingredients,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proLicenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eatMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAlonesale,jdbcType=BIT}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isBest,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isPromote,jdbcType=BIT}, #{bonusTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sellerNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{giveIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select GOODS_ID, BRAND_ID, FOOD_TASTE, WEIGHT, LENGTH, SIZE, COLOR, PACKAGES, STORAGE_TYPE, SOURCE_ADDR, PRODUCE_ADDR, INGREDIENTS, SPECS, PRO_STANDARD, PRO_LICENSE_NO, EAT_METHOD, CLICK_COUNT, IS_ALONESALE, INTEGRAL, IS_DELETE, IS_BEST, IS_NEW, IS_HOT, IS_PROMOTE, BONUS_TYPE_ID, SELLER_NOTE, GIVE_INTEGRAL from g_goods_param
